invalid_api_params.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See "err.error_data" array for more details.

unauthorized_api_request.message: Access denied due to invalid credentials. Please inspect if you are using a valid API Key and Secret to send the request. You can verify the API Key against the one shown on developer's page in OST Platform and re-submit.

unauthorized_for_main_env.message: You do not have the permission to switch to production environment. Please wait while your account is being whitelisted.

invalid_or_expired_jwt_token.message: Invalid or expired JWT Token. The token usually expires due to a long running browser session. Please inspect for what is being sent, rectify and re-submit.

client_api_credentials_expired.message: Access denied due to using expired API key and secret. You can check the active API Key and secret on developer's page in OST Platform.

api_under_maintenance.message: Sorry, we are down for maintaince. We'll be back up and running as soon as possible

resource_not_found.message: Resource not found. Please check the resource identifier passed in the URL is valid and try again.

unsupported_routes.message: Unsupported API version. Please make sure a supported API version is included in API endpoint and try again.

invalid_params.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See "err.error_data" array for more details.

could_not_proceed.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

insufficient_funds.message: The transfer could not be completed because the associated account does not have sufficient balance.

insufficient_gas.message: The transfer could not be completed because the gas required to complete the transfer was not sufficient .

invalid_branded_token.message: Invalid Token name. Min 3 characters or numbers and Max 4. No special characters allowed.

duplicate_entry.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See "err.error_data" array for more details.

token_not_setup.message: The token setup is not completed. The process takes several minutes. You can check the status via OST Platform interface. If the state persists contact support@ost.com

invalid_address.message: Invalid parameter address. This field accepts data_type 'address' as input which holds a 20 byte value. Please inspect for what is being sent, rectify and re-submit.

cache_issue.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

cache_key_invalid.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

cache_servers_unavailable.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

invalid_api_name.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See "err.error_data" array for more details.

invalid_api_version.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See "err.error_data" array for more details.

entity_formatting_failed.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

no_data_found.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

token_already_deployed.message: The token has already been successfully deployed.

token_not_deployed.message: The token has not been deployed yet.

unable_to_get_transaction_count.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

unable_to_get_queued_transaction.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

could_not_clear_missing_nonce.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed.

callback_function_is_mandatory.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See "err.error_data" array for more details.

ddb_batch_write_failed.message: DDB Batch PUT failed for some or all entries.

ddb_batch_get_failed.message: DDB Batch GET failed for some or all entries.

ddb_batch_delete_failed.message: DDB Batch DELETE failed for some or all entries.

route_prohibited_in_main.message: You do not have the permission to access this API endpoint in production environment.

action_prohibited_in_prod_main.message: This action is prohibited in the Production Main Environment.

acquire_lock_failed.message: Acquire Lock failed. Please try again after sometime.

user_activation_failed.message: The User activation could not be completed. Please do ...!! ??

action_not_performed_contact_support.message: Action could not be performed. Please contact support.

token_holder_not_active.message: Token Holder is either logging out or already logged out.

another_recovery_operation_in_process.message: Another recovery operation is happening for User. Please try after sometime.

initiate_recovery_request_not_present.message: Initiate Recovery request for user not found.

initiate_recovery_is_pending.message: One Initiate Recovery request is already waiting for Admin approval.

recovery_already_in_progress.message: Recovery for this user is already in progress.

recovery_never_initiated.message: Recovery for this user was never initiated.

user_recovery_pending.message: User's recovery request is pending. Please try other operations after sometime.

device_pin_already_used.message: This pin was used recently. Please use another pin for security reasons.

error_in_fetching_users.message: Failed to fetch userIds. This means OST server is not available, its a temporary problem. Make sure your connection is not going idle or you are not seeing any timeouts. Verify and re-submit the request a bit later.

error_in_fetching_user_ids.message: Failed to fetch user_ids. This means OST server is not available, its a temporary problem. Make sure your connection is not going idle or you are not seeing any timeouts. Verify and re-submit the request a bit later.

error_in_fetching_user_salts.message: Failed to fetch user_salts. This means OST server is not available, its a temporary problem. Make sure your connection is not going idle or you are not seeing any timeouts. Verify and re-submit the request a bit later.

fetch_balance_failed.message: Failed to fetch balance. This means OST server is not available, its a temporary problem. Make sure your connection is not going idle or you are not seeing any timeouts. Verify and re-submit the request a bit later.

user_status_update_failed.message: User status update operation failed and the user has been rolledback to previous state. Verify the request being sent and re-start the operation.

price_point_not_set.message: Price point not set as maxRetryCountForVerifyPriceInContract reached.

invalid_contract_price_point.message: Error while getting price from contract.

transaction_meta_observer_pending_transa.message: Transaction meta observer faced an error.

balance_verifier_balance_mismatch.message: Balance mismatch occurred while verifying balances.

finalizer_stuck.message: Finalizer stuck due to Pending tasks of Transaction parser.

cron_stuck.message: Cron stuck for a long time.

cron_stopped.message: Cron is in stopped state for at least one interval.

low_eth_balance_master_internal_funder.message: Low Eth balance of master internal funder.

recovery_owner_status_not_updated.message: Recovery owner addresses statuses was not updated.

user_recovery_owner_not_updated.message: Could not update user with new recovery owner address.

initiated_recovery_mail_failure.message: Could not send mail for initiated recovery of clientId.

elevated_privilege_required.message: Elevated privileges are required for operation.

port_in_use.message: The port is already in use.

no_new_block_from_geth.message: No new block from Geth, block parser waiting for new blocks.

block_hash_dont_match.message: Hash of block number does not match the available block hash.

balance_rollback_failed.message: Balance Rollback Failed from API Thread.

stake_currency_bt_conversion_mismatch.message: Mismatch in stake currency amount and bt amount.
